resources.string: Your workout is not yet saved. If you quit now, all changes will be lost!\n\nAre you sure you wish to quit?
Provides a button in the more details section for each exercise in the current workout page that, when clicked, launches a video using the provided URL for the specific exercise.
Converts all units from imperial units (lb) to metric units (kg).
Provides a stopwatch accessible from the bottom of the current workout page.
Provides a timer accessible from the bottom of the current workout page.
Restart this workout and return to the first day of the workout with all exercises unchecked? \n\nThe statistics for this workout will be updated using the workout progress below.
App Logo uses free SVG found here. \n\nDefault Profile Picture was created by Smashicons.
Are you sure you wish to delete this week?\n\nDoing so will delete ALL days associated with this week, and this action cannot be reversed.
Are you sure you wish to delete day?\n\nDoing so will delete ALL exercises associated with this day, and this action cannot be reversed.
Please enter the username or email for the account whose password that you wish to reset. A code will be sent to the email associated with that account.
You are not blocking any users
Displays a progress bar in the current workout page showing the percentage of exercises completed in the workout.

LiteWeight is used for creating and tracking custom workouts. The "Current Workout" page contains the workout that you are currently working on. As you cycle through the days you can track which exercises you completed that day by checking the checkbox, and can update the weight, sets, or reps by expanding the row.

Whenever you are ready you can restart the workout to be brought back to day one with all exercises ready to be completed again! Go to the "My Workouts" page to edit an existing workout or to create a new one. The "My Exercises" page contains a collection of all your exercises and the default values associated with them.

Add friends by going to the Friend's List in the "My Account" page. There you can send a friend request to any LiteWeight user. You can send your workout to any user either directly from your friend's list or from the "My Workouts" page.
At this time, you are not able to see previous states of workouts. Previous progress of a workout can be inferred from the exercise completion average of the workout.

When you share a workout to another user, it makes a copy of the workout at the time of you sharing it. Thus, any changes you make will not be reflected in the copy you sent them. You must send it again for them to get the updated changes.

Whenever you create a new workout or add exercises to an existing workout, the exercises will take the value of the default values specified for that exercise. Changing the values of an exercise, (i.e. sets, reps, details), when they are in a workout will NOT update the default values.\n\nThe only default field that can change from changing it in an existing or new workout is weight. If enabled in your account preferences, the default weight will automatically get updated upon saving or restarting a workout whenever the weight in that workout is higher than the current default weight.
Use this form to send any feedback you have about the app. Be it concerns, bugs, or success stories!
Please enter the code sent to your email.
Prevents users not on your friend\'s list from sending you friend requests or workouts.
Upon restarting a workout, completed exercises will have their default weights updated if the weight of the completed exercise is higher than its current default.
Upon creating or editing a workout, exercises will have their default weights updated if the weight of the exercise is higher than its current default.

Can I see previous progress of already restarted workouts?
I’m getting a new phone - do I need to transfer my data over to it?
Nope, all data (except local app settings) is stored in the cloud!
I shared a workout to my friend and then changed it and they didn’t get the changes. What gives?

Click the \"Sign In\" button below to skip manual email verifications.\n\nNote the selected email MUST match the email you are using for your new LiteWeight account.
If you do not wish to verify your email here, click the \"Send Code\" button to have a verification code sent to your inbox.
You have no workouts to send
What are these “default” values in the details page of one of my exercises?
Copy this day to one of the following days.\n\nNote that doing this will overwrite all the existing exercises in the target day.
Copy this week to one of the following weeks.\n\nNote that doing this will overwrite ALL existing days in the target week.
Set an optional tag for this day. Tags can be used to easily distinguish one day from another. E.g. \"Bicep Day\"
Launch this video using an external application?
Copy this day to one of the following weeks.\n\nNote that this will append the copied day to the end of the week.
